key_themes: AI infrastructure and semiconductor supply constraints
Mega-cap tech leadership divergence and market breadth concerns
Policy expectations around rate trajectory and energy supply
Valuation extremes and Shiller P/E warnings
Global rate pressure from Japan deleveraging risk
risk_factors: Valuation extremes mirroring bubble conditions with Shiller P/E at historic highs
Leadership divergence with NVDA/AAPL underperforming during ATH rallies indicating deteriorating internals
Japan 30-year yield hitting 3.527% signaling potential global deleveraging cascade
NDX triangle breakdown risk as technical reversal catalyst
Policy execution failures on energy supply expansion or Fed rate cut timeline delays
